casebody.data:
STATE
v.
COLLIER. No. COA07-1556. Court of Appeals of North Carolina. Filed June 17, 2008. Certification Date July 7, 2008. Appeal from Guilford (06CRS77586, 06CRS77587, 06CRS77588).

Case reported without published opinion. No error in part, remanded in part for correction of clerical error.
